title: Bills stadium revisions approved, adding food markets and bus area - Buffalo Business First

title: New Buffalo Bills stadium could be completed early
snippet: Fans take photographs of the new stadium under construction from the walkway to the upper deck before the Buffalo Bills game against the Kansas City Chiefs at Highmark Stadium in Orchard Park, Sunday, Nov. 2, 2025.
